column5: Went for a hike with my daughter today and met a guest....  http://www.vimeo.com/1455254  PS. You may need to cut and paste into your browser.  :-)
Great vid. I got to show my son the catch one .LOL
Great video Tundra N Lightning    great encounter with wild life..... she didn't mind too much that you were filming her.  Leechman

We stayed back for a few minutes to make sure she was kewl with it before moving closer to get some shots and video.  She was very comfortable with our presence.  We decided to go off the path to go around her, but were presented with a younger looking male who did not seem as pleased.    We backed off slowly and went upon our merry way.  :-)
